content: before end of n2 k2tog k1 *repeat across needles 3 and 4 4 sts decrease round 2 and 3 k all sts repeat rounds 1-3 until 36 sts rem in total 9sts per needle then decrease as follows round 1 work as round 1 above round 2 work as round 2 above repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 24 28 sts rem 6 7 sts per needle finishing cut yarn leaving a 12 tail and using a tapestry needle graft sts decrease using the kitchener stitch weave in ends at toe and rectify gap at cuff © dawn henderson page �4 of �5 @dawn landix // dlyn1124@gmail com lyne socks chart a chart b © dawn henderson page �5 of �5 @dawn landix // dlyn1124@gmail com
